q: â¢ Everybody in one 10-man fantasy-football league in Omaha agreed with Spud Mann's suggestion to tattoo the last-place finisher with art of the league champion's choosing. David Filsinger finished first. Mann finished last. "The kid I was playing for the tattoo was about to have a heart attack, Mann said. "But he put up 140 points on me."...
